puzzles package

Submodules

puzzles.geometric_shapes module

class puzzles.geometric_shapes.GeometricPuzzle[source]

Bases: PuzzleBase

A puzzle where players align geometric shapes to match a target pattern.

target_pattern

The randomly generated target pattern.

Type:

list[list[int]]

player_pattern

The player’s current pattern.

Type:

list[list[int]]

display_instructions()[source]

Displays instructions for solving the geometric puzzle.

display_patterns()[source]

Displays both the target pattern and the player’s current pattern.

generate_target_pattern()[source]

Generates a random target pattern for the puzzle.

Returns:

A 2D list representing the target pattern.

Return type:

list[list[int]]

is_solved()[source]

Checks if the player’s pattern matches the target pattern.

Returns:

True if the patterns match, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

solve()[source]

Runs the main logic for solving the puzzle, allowing the player to interactively toggle positions.

update_pattern(x, y)[source]

Toggles the state of a position in the player’s pattern.

Parameters:

  • x (int) – The row index to toggle.

  • y (int) – The column index to toggle.

class puzzles.puzzle_base.PuzzleBase(name)[source]

The name of the puzzle.
